wgw-new-subscription-bin-success.html_body:
Dear {{ case.personRelationships[0].person.forename }} {{ case.personRelationships[0].person.surname }}

Subscription Reference {{ case.reference }}

Thank you for signing up to the Swindon Borough Council Garden Waste Collection Service. 

Your payment was successful and, if you requested one, a green bin will be delivered within 10 working days.   You will also receive, in time for the 1st April, a subscription sticker in the post for each paid for bin to identify that you have paid for this service.  All bins must display a valid subscription sticker in order to be collected.

If you have not received your bin or sticker within this timeframe please log a Garden Waste Enquiry to let us know.

Collections run from {{ case.values.service_start.value|date('d/m/Y') }} until {{ case.values.service_expiry.value|date('d/m/Y') }}, excluding two weeks over Christmas and New Year.  You can view your collection dates here.

For more information on this service, including the Terms and Conditions, please visit Garden Waste Collections.

We thank you for joining the service and hope you find it a convenient and valuable service.

Yours Sincerely,

Waste & Recycling Team
Swindon Borough Council
wgw-new-subscription-bin-success.subject: New Garden Waste Subscription
wgw-new-subscription-bin-success.title: New Subscription Bin Success

wgw-renewal-due.html_body:
Dear {{ case.personRelationships[0].person.forename }} {{ case.personRelationships[0].person.surname }}

Subscription Reference {{ case.reference }}

Thank you for subscribing to the garden waste collection service last year, we hope you found it a convenient and valuable service. We would like to remind you that your subscription is due to expire on 31 March 2018. 

If you would like to subscribe for another year you can enjoy the following benefits;

  • Great value for money at just £2 per collection, per bin (£50 annual subscription)
  • Uninterrupted collections if renewed by 9th March 2018
  • NEW! Direct Debit payment option available for an easy, no fuss single annual payment
  • Personalised subscription sticker for your bin

To subscribe for 2018-19 collections please read the new Terms & Conditions of service and go to https://www.swindon.gov.uk/forms/form/400/en/managerenew_your_garden_waste_subscription. You will need to log in to your My Account first and will need to input your subscription reference number above. 

Problems logging in to My Account

If you are having trouble logging into your My Account it may be caused by one of the following issues;

  1. You have forgotten your password
  2. You haven’t activated your account
  3. You haven’t created an account

Forgotten Password

If you have an active account and have forgotten your password please go to the log in screen and click on ‘problems signing in’,enter your email address, an email will be sent containing instructions on resetting your password.

Inactive Account

You will need to have activated your account before you can log in.  We have emailed an account activation invite from noreply@swindon.gov.uk to all affected users between 15th and 28th January. Please check your junk/spam folder and use this email to activate your account. If you cannot find the reminder please email our customer services team who can resend the invite: customerservices@swindon.gov.uk.

If you have already subscribed, we apologise, and no further action is required.

Yours sincerely,

Waste & Recycling Team

Swindon Borough Council
wgw-renewal-due.subject: Garden Waste Subscription Renewal
wgw-renewal-due.title: Renewal Due

wgw-renewal-success.html_body:
Dear {{ case.personRelationships[0].person.forename }} {{ case.personRelationships[0].person.surname }}

Subscription Reference {{ case.reference }}

Thank you for your subscription to the garden waste collection service for another year. Your payment was successful and you will receive your bin sticker(s) in the post by the 1st April to identify that you have paid for this service.

Your collections will continue on the same day and week until the {{ case.values.service_expiry.value|date('d/m/Y') }}.  You can view your collection dates here and find more information on this service, including the Terms and Conditions.  

Yours Sincerely,

Waste & Recycling Team
Swindon Borough Council
wgw-renewal-success.subject: Garden Waste Subscription Success
wgw-renewal-success.title: Renewal Success Bins

wgw-final-renewal-reminder.html_body:
Dear {{ case.personRelationships[0].person.forename }} {{ case.personRelationships[0].person.surname }}

Subscription Reference {{ case.reference }}

We would like to remind you that your Garden Waste Subscription is due to expire on the 31st March. 

Please renew your subscription by Friday 9th March in order to avoid a disruption to your collections: Manage/Renew your garden waste.

If you renew after this date you may not receive your subscription sticker in time for the 1st April which could affect your collections.  Only registered bins displaying a personalised 2018-19 subscription sticker will be emptied from the 1st April.

Once payment has been successfully received, your collections will continue on your usual week and day for another year.   

Yours Sincerely,

Waste & Recycling Team
Swindon Borough Council
wgw-final-renewal-reminder.subject: Garden Waste Subscription Final Reminder
wgw-final-renewal-reminder.title: Final Renewal Reminder

wgw-cheque-payment-pending.html_body:
Dear {{ case.personRelationships[0].person.forename }} {{ case.personRelationships[0].person.surname }}

Thank you for signing up to the Garden Waste Collection service.  

Subscription Reference {{ case.reference }}

Your cheque payment is currently being processed and once it has cleared we will contact you to confirm successful payment and provide details of your garden waste collections.
 
The easiest and quickest way to renew your subscription is online via www.swindon.gov.uk/gardenwaste where you can make your payment online at any time of the day.

You can now choose to set up a direct debit for easy, no fuss single annual payment. You will be notified before future payments are taken from your account and all payments are protected by the Direct Debit guarantee.  
 
Yours Sincerely, 
 
Waste & Recycling Team
Swindon Borough Council
wgw-cheque-payment-pending.subject: Garden Waste Subscription Pending Payment
wgw-cheque-payment-pending.title: Cheque Payment Pending

wgw-subscription-expired.html_body:
Dear {{ case.personRelationships[0].person.forename }} {{ case.personRelationships[0].person.surname }}

Subscription Reference {{ case.reference }} 

Please be aware that your garden waste subscription expired on the 31st March and your garden waste will no longer be collected.  

If you would like to continue receiving collections please renew your subscription within the next 14 days: Manage/Renew your garden waste.

Failure to do so will close your subscription so that it cannot be renewed, if you choose to subscribe again in the future you will need to take out a new subscription.
 
Yours Sincerely,
 
Waste & Recycling Team
Swindon Borough Council
wgw-subscription-expired.subject: Garden Waste Subscription Expired
wgw-subscription-expired.title: Subscription Expired

wgw-new-subscription-bag-success.html_body:
Dear {{ case.personRelationships[0].person.forename }} {{ case.personRelationships[0].person.surname }}

Subscription Reference: {{ case.reference }}
 

Thank you for signing up to Swindon Borough Council’s Garden Waste Collection Service. We are pleased to confirm that your payment was successful.
 
Our records show that your property is provided with blue bags for your refuse, we will therefore issue you with an annual (pro-rata) supply of garden waste bags. These will be delivered within 10 working days.    

If this is incorrect and you have a wheelie bin for your refuse collections or if you are on a blue bag collection for your refuse and you would prefer to have a 240 litre wheelie bin; please log a Garden Waste Enquiry to get this amended.  
 
Please ensure all bags are tied securely and left at the kerbside, clearly visible to collection crews.  Collections run from {{ case.values.service_start.value|date('d/m/Y') }} until {{ case.values.service_expiry.value|date('d/m/Y') }}, excluding two weeks over Christmas and New Year.  You can view your collection dates here.

For more information on this service, including the Terms and Conditions, please visit Garden Waste Collections.
 

We thank you for joining the service and hope you find it a convenient and valuable service.

Yours Sincerely,
 
Waste & Recycling Team
Swindon Borough Council
wgw-new-subscription-bag-success.subject: New Garden Waste Subscription
wgw-new-subscription-bag-success.title: New Subscription Bag Success

wgw-direct-debit-payment-pending.html_body:
Dear {{ case.personRelationships[0].person.forename }} {{ case.personRelationships[0].person.surname }}

Thank you for signing up to the Garden Waste Collection Service.

Subscription Reference {{ case.reference }}
 

Your request to set up a Direct Debit is currently being processed by our provider First Capital Cashflow Ltd. Once your details have been verified, which can take up to 10 working days, we will contact you to confirm successful payment and provide details of your garden waste collection.

Yours Sincerely,

Waste & Recycling Team
Swindon Borough Council
wgw-direct-debit-payment-pending.subject: Garden Waste Collection Service Direct Debit Request
wgw-direct-debit-payment-pending.title: New Direct Debit Payment Pending

wgw-payment-failed-dd.html_body:
Dear {{ case.personRelationships[0].person.forename }} {{ case.personRelationships[0].person.surname }}

 

Subscription Reference {{ case.reference }}
 

We recently tried to process your Direct Debit payment for your subscription to the Garden Waste Collection Service but, unfortunately, the payment has failed. If you are unsure why the payment might have failed please contact your bank.

If you still wish to subscribe to the service we require a new payment to be made using an alternative payment method. Please contact us on 01793 465650 to make a payment by card within the next 7 days to ensure your subscription is processed fully.

Yours Sincerely,
 
Waste & Recycling Team

Swindon Borough Council
wgw-payment-failed-dd.subject: Payment Failed - Garden Waste Subscription Service
wgw-payment-failed-dd.title: Payment Failed - DD

wgw-payment-failed-cheque.html_body:
Dear {{ case.personRelationships[0].person.forename }} {{ case.personRelationships[0].person.surname }}

Subscription Reference {{ case.reference }}
 

We recently tried to process your cheque payment for your subscription to the Garden Waste Collection Service but, unfortunately the payment has failed. If you are unsure why the payment might have failed, please contact your bank.

We do require a new payment to be made using an alternative payment method, if you still wish to subscribe to the service. The easiest and quickest way to make a card payment is to call 01793 445501 ask to make a Garden Waste Payment using the above reference number.

 
Yours Sincerely,
 
Waste & Recycling Team
Swindon Borough Council
wgw-payment-failed-cheque.subject: Payment Failed - Garden Waste Subscription Service
wgw-payment-failed-cheque.title: Payment Failed - Cheque
